channel.description: Recent content in Cross Platform on coda.life

item.title: Microsoft Dev Stack on macOS
item.description: Gonna evangelize a little bit. When Microsoft bought Xamarin, they did not underestimate the power of Xamarin.Forms for building cross platform UIs. Now with the release of Visual Studio for macOS and the Dotnet Core, its looks like its going to stay alive. Development Environment macOS, XCode Android SDK Dotnet core Visual Studio for macOS nuget Web ASP.NET Production Environment Digital Ocean Dotnet core on Docker Dokku, docker based heroku Platforms Targeted in One Solution iOS Android Web ASP.
